page-developers-about-desc: Nephele.org is here to help you build with Nephele with documentation on foundational concepts as well as the development stack. Plus there are tutorials to get you up and running.
page-developers-about-desc-2: Inspired by the Mozilla Developer Network, we thought Nephele needed a place to house great developer content and resources. Like our friends at Mozilla, everything here is open-source and ready for you to extend and improve.
page-developers-account-desc: Contracts or people on the network

page-developers-dev-env-desc: IDEs that are suitable for dapp development
page-developers-feedback: If you have any feedback, reach out to us via a GitHub issue or on our Discord server.
page-developers-frameworks-desc: Tools for helping speed up development
page-developers-get-started: How would you like to get started?
page-developers-improve-Nephele-desc: Like Nephele.org, these docs are a community effort. Create a PR if you see mistakes, room for improvement, or new opportunities to help Nephele developers.
